name: Warframe Market
detailed_description:
Warframe Market is a tool mainly used for Warframe players to publish and search for tradable items. It also provides additional auxiliary tools to simplify the user's entry of items and to understand the price fluctuations of items in the game more conveniently and quickly.

What can you buy and sell?

  • Mod, Riven Mod, Arcanes
  • Weapon Components, Warframe Components, Archwing Components, Guardian Components
  • Void Relics
  • Weapons
  • Arcane Helmets
  • Fish, Ore, Kavat Imprints,Kubrow Imprints， Scenes for Capture
  • Orbiter Appearance Components

Main function

  • Quick registration: This software can quickly register this software by reading the record file and extracting key information (which can be modified). Users only need to set a password.
  • Market: Publish and search Prime components, Mod, group weapons and other items, and can quickly generate in-game chat statements
  • Riven Market: Publishing and Searching Riven Mod and Riven Analysis Services to Make Users Control Price Accurately
  • Riven Mod Analysis: Through the chart form, users can more intuitively understand the best attribute selection of each riven mod, as well as their historical average price fluctuation, the fluctuation of the best price, volume change.
  • Weapon Analysis: Users can compare the number of weapons with different prefixes horizontally, such as Prime, Prism, Wraith, Vandal...
  • Third-party market: This software provides data search services for third-party trading websites and provides localization support in different languages for non-English players to use.
    Optical Recognition: Users can extract the Price components, Mod and Riven information contained in the picture through the screenshot of the game, so as to quickly know its approximate value, and can quickly publish it to the market for other users to search and purchase.
  • Communication: any registered user of this software can send information and e-mail to other users to express his purchase intention.
  • Language support: At present, this software provides two options in English and simplified Chinese.

Future plan

  • provides more linguistic options for users around the world so that items on this platform can be retrieved by more people
  • Provide more data source of third-party websites
  • Interface optimization may add multiple theme styles for users to choose

This software will continue to be developed and improved. If you encounter unsatisfactory problems, please go to the Steam community for feedback, or send an email to the support mailbox.

short_description: It's a tool for trading warframe items.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
